item.title: Apache Content Negotiation Settings
item.description: Apache content negotiation settings check default settings about Apache vim /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf # # For type maps (negotiated resources): # (This is enabled by default to allow the Apache "It Worked" page # to be distributed in multiple languages.) # AddHandler type-map var cd /var/www/html/ ls -l -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 17 Sep 21 09:49 index.en.html -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 93 Sep 21 09:49 index.html.var -rw-r--r--. 1 root root 19 Sep 21 09:50 index.
